## Description
The **Join Flows **task allows to retrieve the outputs of different tasks, without merging data. This task only returns the output of the main branch, but makes the outputs of the joined tasks available to the following tasks in the workflow (for example, to retrieve the catalog for a DT task, or to access data from other branches).

It may also be used to wait for the execution of one or more tasks before proceeding with the workflow.

> Important

The resulting Lot ID is inherited from the main branch.

## Configuration
![](data:image/png;base64,)	

- In the **Alias **field, enter the name of the task that will be displayed in the workflow.

- In the **Origin **field, select the previous task in the workflow that identifies the main branch.
